title.rendered: The Most Useful Android Apps in Everyday Life

content.rendered:
There are over 2.5 million apps available in the Google Play Store, which ones are the most useful? Of course, every person will have a different answer, but the apps mentioned in this article can be used by anyone! 

The average person spends 3.5 hours on their phone, if you’re awake for 14 hours out of the day, 3 hours is a considerable amount of time! You’ll want to make sure you’re getting the most out of your time spent online. 

With that said, here’s our list of the most useful Android apps available for free on the Google Play store. 

Dumpster 

If you take a lot of photos & videos we’d highly recommend you use Dumpster. Dumpster is a backup app that restores accidentally deleted photos, videos, files, documents, and more!

The app can restore any old deleted file and keep them from being deleted off of your device. It’s free to use and over 40 Million people have used it to recover deleted photo & video files!

Here are a few of Dumpster’s defining features:

  • Backup Android apps, photos, video, files, & more
  • Instantly recover important files 
  • No internet connection required 
  • No need to root your device 
  • Cloud storage

Cover

Cover is the world’s ultimate secret photo vault. You can hide & lock away photos, videos, and other files.Your content is automatically encrypted and hidden in a vault that you can password protect with a PIN or fingerprint authentication. Not to mention, Cover automatically hides any incoming explicit content.

Here’s what sets Cover apart from the rest of the photo vault competition:

  • Automatic Protection: Sensitive photos & videos will automatically be moved to a private vault.
  • Smart Notifications: Cover subtly notifies you if explicit pictures or videos are detected.
  • Messaging Blocking: Cover will block any inappropriate photos sent via Messenger, Telegram, Whatsapp, & more!

Google Calendar

Google Calendar is one of the best apps to ensure you’re making the absolute most of your days! The app is great for scheduling events, however, you can also use it as a scheduling tool, reminder, todo list, and a goal setter!

It’s a simple yet highly effective utility app if you make the most out of it! If you aren’t familiar with it’s functionality, here’s a high-level overview of Google’s simplistic and convenient calendar app:

  • Month, week, and daily scheduling view
  • Add Events from Gmail (Flights, hotel reservations, concert, date nights, etc.)
  • Reminders (Option to set recurring reminders)
  • Goal setting  
  • Scheduling overview (All calendars in one place)

Insight Timer

The busier you are, the more you need Insight Timer! Meditation is a practice in any successful and productive person’s life. Taking the time out to breathe may seem simple, or even counter-intuitive, but you won’t believe the benefits until you try the app out for yourself.

Insight Timer is an award-winning, highly-regarded meditation app used by millions across the world. Here are a few of its features:

  • 40,000+ guided meditations
  • Positive habit-forming tools built into the app
  • Thousands of music tracks and ambient sounds  
  • Influential teachers
  • Thousands of discussion & support groups 
  • Progress & milestone tracking 

Whatsapp

Need we say more? If you don’t already have Whatsapp installed on your Android phone or tablet, we highly recommend you do so to keep SMS, texts, messages, and group chats in one central place!

This Editor’s Choice messing app is used by over a whopping 2 Billion people. Whatsapp connects people around the world for free and seamlessly at that. If you’re wondering what puts Whatsapp over the top, here’s the list:

  • No fees
  • Send photos, videos, voice messages, and more
  • Free calls
  • Group chats
  • Web compatibility 
  • No international charges

Secure VPN

Secure VPN is a lightning-fast app that provides users with completely free VPN proxy services. All you need to do is click one button, and you can instantly access the Internet securely and anonymously.

If you’re online every single day, as quite literally, the entire world is, it’s extremely important to make sure you’re browsing safely and securely. Using a trusted VPN like Secure VPN you’ll be able to encrypt your connection so no one can track what you’re doing online.

Here are a few of Secure VPN’s finest features:

  • High-speed bandwidth
  • Choose apps which using VPN (Android 5.0+ required)
  • Works with Wi-Fi, LTE/4G, 3G and all mobile data carriers
  • Strict no-logging policy
  • Smart choose server
  • No usage and time limit
  • No registration or configuration required

Get Dumpster now!
